Articles.Content: My wheel doesn't have any sound at all. I'm in kerbin, so the sound must be somewhere

Hello

Beautiful rover! But when my kernels wants to board, they are unable to walk on the jetway once they are at the top of the ladder.... how do you board them?
Dear Nils2778.Can you please update ''Feline Utility Rovers'' for version 1.12.5.Because when you instal bunch of other mods it can just not appear in parts. [snip]

- Outdated posting -

Edited April 25, 2023 by Rakete
Hello, does anybody know how to board those stupid kernels, once they are on top of the ladder: they are unable to walk on the jetway to board!!!
This is gonna sound really stupid since I am assuming I am missing it... but why would the fuel tanks not have an option for the mix needed for the Fuel Cells?
fuel cells? these things just using pure _fuel_ ?!

On 7/20/2023 at 2:22 PM, JediRangerkendor said:

This is gonna sound really stupid since I am assuming I am missing it... but why would the fuel tanks not have an option for the mix needed for the Fuel Cells? 

Because they look at engines, not generators or converters (which is what the fuel cells are configured to be)

Hey there, I'm loving the models and functionality but I personally find the reflections a bit jarring. I don't seem to have the same option to enable the effect with any windows on other parts. I tried playing with reflections off, but they still stay reflective. I tried looking here but I can't seem to find any way to turn them off. Is that possible to do on my end?  I also attempted looking through the mod files but I honestly have no idea what I'm looking for lol.

And thanks for your hard work!
hey i know this thread is quite old, but is there a reason why there aren't air filters on the life support module? a bit silly that I have a finite supply of o2 when driving around Kerbin.
